translations.text: Hudanw Wa-rahmatal lilmuhsineen

translations.text: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum yooqinoon

translations.text: Ulaaa'ika 'alaa hudam mir Rabbihim Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

words.en: And of||the mankind||(is he) who||purchases||idle tales||idle tales||to mislead||from||(the) path||(of) Allah||without||knowledge||and takes it||(in) ridicule||Those||for them||(is) a punishment||humiliating

translations.text: Wa-minan naasi maien yashtaree lahwal hadeesi li-yudilla 'an sabeelil laahi bighairi ilminw Wa-yattakhizahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

words.id: dan apabila||dibacakan||kepadanya||ayat-ayat Kami||dia berpaling||menyombongkan diri||seakan-akan||tidak||dia mendengarnya||seakan-akan||di||kedua telinganya||sumbat||maka beri kabar gembira dia||dengan azab||pedih
words.en: And when||are recited||to him||Our Verses||he turns away||arrogantly||as if||not||he (had) heard them||as if||in||his ears||(is) deafness||So give him tidings||of a punishment||painful

translations.text: Wa-izaa tutlaa alayhi Aayaatunaa wallaa mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa ka-anna feee uzunaihi waqra; fabash-shiru bi'azaabin aleem

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan beramal||shaleh||bagi mereka||surga||penuh dengan kenikmatan
words.en: Indeed||those who||believe||and do||righteous deeds||for them||(are) Gardens||(of) Delight

translations.text: innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum Janaatun Na'eem

words.id: mereka kekal||didalamnya||janji||Allah||benar||dan Dia||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: (To) abide forever||in it||(The) Promise of Allah||(The) Promise of Allah||(is) true||And He||(is) the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: Khaalideena feeha wa'dal laahi haqqaa; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

translations.text: Khalaqas samaawaati bi-ghairi amadin tarawnahaa Wa-alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum Wa-bassa feehaa min kulli daaabbah; Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ambatnaa feeha min kulli zawjin kareem

words.en: This||(is the) creation||(of) Allah||So show Me||what||have created||those||besides Him||besides Him||Nay||the wrongdoers||(are) in||error||clear

translations.text: Haazaa khalqul laahi fa-aroonee maazaa khalaqal lazeena min doonih; baliz zaalimoona fee dalalim Mubeen

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah memberikan||Luqmân||hikmah||agar||bersyukur||kepada Allah||dan barang siapa||bersyukur||maka sesungguhnya hanyalah||ia bersyukur||untuk dirinya sendiri||dan barang siapa yang||ingkar||maka sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Kaya||Maha Terpuji
words.en: And verily||We gave||Luqman||the wisdom||that||Be grateful||to Allah||And whoever||(is) grateful||then only||he is grateful||for himself||And whoever||(is) ungrateful||then indeed||Allah||(is) Free of need||Praiseworthy

translations.text: Wa-laqad aatainaa Luqmaanal hikmata anish kur lillaah; Wa-maien yashkur fa-innamaa yashkuru linafsihee Wa-man kafara fa-innal laaha Ghaniyyun Hameed

words.en: And when||said||Luqman||to his son||while he||(was) instructing him||O my son!||(Do) not||associate partners||with Allah||Indeed||associating partners||(is) surely an injustice||great

translations.text: Wa-iz qaala luqmaanu libnihee Wa-huwa ya'izuhoo ya-bunaiya laa tushrik billaah; innash shirka lazulmun 'azeem

words.id: dan Kami wasiatkan||manusia||terhadap kedua orang tuanya||mengandungnya||ibunya||kelelahan||atas||kelelahan||dan ia menyapihnya||dalam||dua tahun||agar||bersyukurlah||kepada-Ku||dan kepada kedua orang tuamu||kepada-Ku||tempat kembali

translations.text: Wa-wassainal insaana bi-waalidaihi hamalat-hu ummuhoo wahnan 'alaa wahninw Wa-fisaaluhoo fee aamaini anish kur lee Wa-liwaalidaika ilaiyal maseer

translations.text: Wa-in jaahadaaka 'alaaa an tushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee ilmun falaa tuti'humaa Wa-saahib-humaa fid dunyaa ma'roofanw wattabi' sabeela man anaaba ilayy; summa ilaiyya marji'ukum fa-unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

words.id: Wahai keturunan||sesungguhnya||jika||adalah kamu||seberat||biji||dari||sawi||maka adalah||dalam||batu||atau||di||langit(jamak)||atau||didalam||bumi||mendatangkan||dengannya||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Halus||Maha Mengetahui

translations.text: Ya-bunaiya innahaaa in taku misqaala habbatim min khardalin fatakun fee sakhratin aw fis samaawaati aw fil ardi yaati bihal laah; innal laaha lateefun Khabeer

words.id: Wahai keturunan||dirikanlah||sholat||dan suruhlah||dengan yang baik||dan cegahlah||dari||perbuatan yang mungkar||dan bersabarlah||atas||apa||menimpa kamu||sesungguhnya||demikian itu||dari||ketetapan/kesungguhan||perkara/perintah
words.en: O my son||Establish||the prayer||and enjoin||[with] the right||and forbid||from||the wrong||and be patient||over||what||befalls you||Indeed||that||(is) of||the matters requiring determination||the matters requiring determination

translations.text: Yaa bunaiya aqimis-Salaata waamur bilma'roofi wanha anil munkari wasbir 'alaa maaa asaabaka inna zaalika min azmil umoor

words.id: dan jangan||kamu memalingkan||mukamu||kepada manusia||dan jangan||kamu berjalan||di muka||bumi||angkuh||sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak||menyukai||setiap||orang yang sombong||kebanggaan diri
words.en: And (do) not||turn||your cheek||from men||and (do) not||walk||in||the earth||exultantly||Indeed||Allah||(does) not||like||every||self-conceited||boaster

translations.text: Wa-laa tusa'-ir khaddaka linnaasi Wa-laa tamshi fil ardi maarahan innal laaha laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor

words.id: dan sederhanakanlah||didalam||berjalanmu||dan lunakkan||dari||suara||sesungguhnya||seburuk-buruk||suara-suara||sungguh suara||keledai
words.en: And be moderate||in||your pace||and lower||[of]||your voice||Indeed||(the) harshest||(of all) sounds||(is) surely (the) voice||(of) the donkeys

translations.text: Waqsid fee mashyika waghdud min sawtik; inna ankaral aswaati lasawtul hameer

words.id: tidakkah||kamu perhatikan||bahwasanya||Allah||Dia telah menundukkan||bagi kalian||apa yang||di||langit(jamak)||dan apa yang||di||bumi||dan Dia telah menyempurnakan||atas kalian||nikmat-Nya||lahir||dan batin||dan diantara||manusia||orang||ia membantah||tentang||Allah||dengan tanpa||ilmu pengetahuan||dan tanpa||petunjuk||dan tidak||kitab||memberi penerangan

translations.text: Alam taraw annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fis sa-maawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-asbagha alaikum ni'amahoo zaahiratanw Wa-baatinah; Wa-minan naasi many yujaadilu fil laahi bighayri ilminw Wa-laa hudanw Wa-laa Kitaabim muneer

translations.text: Wa-izaa qeela lahumut tabi'oo maaa anzalal laahu qaaloo bal nattabi'u maa wajadnaa alaihi aabaaa'anaa; awalaw kaanash Shaitaanu yad'oohum ilaa azaabis sa'eer

words.id: dan barang siapa||menyerahkan||wajahnya/dirinya||kepada||Allah||dan dia||orang yang berbuat kebaikan||maka sesungguhnya||dia telah berpegang||pada tali||teguh/kokoh||dan kepada||Allah||kesudahan||segala perkara
words.en: And whoever||submits||his face||to||Allah||while he||(is) a good- doer||then indeed||he has grasped||the handhold||the most trustworthy||And to||Allah||(is the) end||(of) the matters

translations.text: Wa-maien yuslim wajha-hooo ilal laahi Wa-huwa muhsinun faqadis tamsaka bil'ur-watil wusqaa; Wa-ilal laahi aaqibatul umoor

words.id: dan barang siapa yang||kafir||maka jangan||menyusahkan kamu||kekafirannya||kepada Kami||tempat kembali mereka||lalu Kami jelaskan kepada mereka||tentang apa||mereka kerjakan||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mengetahui||dengan yang ada||dada
words.en: And whoever||disbelieves||let not||grieve you||his disbelief||To Us||(is) their return||then We will inform them||of what||they did||Indeed||Allah||(is) the All-Knower||of what||(is in) the breasts

translations.text: Wa-man kafara falaa yahzunka kufruh; ilainaa marji'uhum fanunabbi'uhum bimaa amiloo; innal laaha 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

words.id: Kami beri kesenangan mereka||sebentar||kemudian||Kami paksakan mereka||kepada||azab||yang keras
words.en: We grant them enjoyment||(for) a little||then||We will force them||to||a punishment||severe

translations.text: Numatti'uhum qaleelan summa nadtarruhum ilaa azaabin ghaleez

words.id: dan sungguh jika||kamu tanyakan kepada mereka||siapakah||menciptakan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||tentu mereka mengatakan||Allah||katakanlah||segala puji||bagi Allah||tetapi||kebanyakan mereka||tidak||mereka mengetahui
words.en: And if||you ask them||Who||created||the heavens||and the earth||They will surely say||Allah||Say||All praises||(are) for Allah||But||most of them||(do) not||know

translations.text: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

words.id: kepunyaan Allah||apa yang||di||langit(jamak)||dan dibumi||sesungguhnya||Allah||Dia||Maha Kaya||Maha Terpuji
words.en: To Allah (belongs)||whatever||(is) in||the heavens||and the earth||Indeed||Allah||He||(is) Free of need||the Praiseworthy

translations.text: Lillaahi ma fis samaa-waati wal-ard; innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

words.id: dan seandainya||apa saja||di||bumi||dari||pohon-pohon||kalam/pena||dan laut||ditambahnya||dari||sesudahnya||tujuh||laut||tidak||habis||beberapa kalimat||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: And if||whatever||(is) in||the earth||of||(the) trees||(were) pens||and the sea||(to) add to it||after it||after it||seven||seas||not||would be exhausted||(the) Words||(of) Allah||Indeed||Allah||(is) All-Mighty||All-Wise

translations.text: Wa-law annamaa fil ardi min shajaratin aqlaamunw wal-bahru yamudduhoo mim ba'dihee sab'atu abhurim maa nafidat Kalimaatul laah; innal laaha 'azeezun Hakeem

words.id: tidak||menciptakan kalian||dan tidak||kebangkitanmu||kecuali||seperti jiwa||satu||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mendengar||Maha Melihat
words.en: Not||(is) your creation||and not||your resurrection||but||as a soul||single||Indeed||Allah||(is) All-Hearer||All-Seer

translations.text: Maa khalqukum Wa-laa ba'sukum illaa kanafsinw waahidah; innal laaha Samee'um Baseer

words.id: tidaklah||kamu memperhatikan||bahwasanya||Allah||Dia memasukkan||malam||ke dalam||siang||dan memasukkan||siang||ke dalam||malam||dan Dia menundukkan||matahari||dan bulan||masing-masing||berjalan/beredar||sampai||waktu||ditentukan||dan bahwasanya||Allah||terhadap apa yang||kamu kerjakan||Maha Mengetahui

translations.text: Alam tara annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara kulluny yajreee ilaaa ajalim musammanw Wa-annal laaha bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer

words.id: demikian itu||bahwa sesungguhnya||Allah||Dia||hak||dan bahwasanya||apa yang||mereka seru||dari||selain Dia||batil||dan sesungguhnya||Allah||Dia||Maha Tinggi||Maha Besar

translations.text: Zaalika bi-annal laaha Huwal Haqqu Wa-anna maa yad'oona min doonihil baatilu Wa-annal laaha Huwal Aliyyul Kabeer

translations.text: Alam tara annal fulka tajree fil bahri bini'matil laahi li-yuriyakum min Aayaatih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

translations.text: Wa-izaa ghashiyahum mawjun kazzulali da'a-wul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena fa-lammaa najjaahum ilal barri faminhum muqtasid; Wa-maa yajhadu bi-Aayaatinaa illaa kullu khattaarin kafoor

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasut taqoo Rabbakum wakhshaw Yawmal laa yajzee waalidun 'anw waladihee Wa-laa mawloodun huwa jaazin 'anw waalidihee shai'aa; innaa wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurran-nakumul hayaatud dunyaa Wa-laa yaghur-rannakum billaahil gharoor
